## ğŸ“‹ Triage Checklist

### For Maintainers
- [ ] Feature scope assessed
- [ ] Priority assigned
- [ ] Stakeholders identified
- [ ] Technical feasibility evaluated
- [ ] Resource requirements estimated
- [ ] Timeline assessed

### Labels to Apply
- `enhancement` (always)
- `priority:critical` / `priority:high` / `priority:medium` / `priority:low`
- `component:<name>` (if applicable)
- `needs-design` (if design required)
- `needs-discussion` (if more discussion needed)
- `good-first-issue` (if suitable for new contributors)

### Next Steps
- [ ] Assign to appropriate team member
- [ ] Add to project board/milestone
- [ ] Schedule for planning discussion
- [ ] Create implementation epic (if large)
